## SimpleProduct.price property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use price\_range for product price information.
> 

A ProductPrices object, indicating the price of an item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
price?: Maybe<ProductPrices>;
```
